overview: “Naughty and vice, it's knock-out city - sexy style! This is the only place to see the most beautiful girls in the world duke it out. Will it be the Lady from the Future or the Brazilian Bombshell who'll be "out for the count?" Come ringside with Deidra and Lazar, the two wildest ladies you'd ever want to meet.”
tagline: Knockout Beauties Fight To The Finish
title: Battling Amazons
